Text:
function ERU_EP04_09()
    -- .承-3【11月第3週】「姫神家の真実」
    SaveData.Title = "姫神家の真実"

    -- //BG：駅前（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002ba")
    -- //BU：アルメリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Normal
 "...Sorry, Mina-chan. I've decided to quit after all." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1327.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Surprise
 "W-why?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ On the way to the hamburger shop, Almeria suddenly stopped walking. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though she was the one who suggested going to the hamburger shop, what on earth was wrong? ]])

    MSG([[ Unable to hide my confusion, Almeria began to explain coolly. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "I haven't told Hermes, but the purpose of this date is to realize the Princess Election involving you and Daria-onee-sama." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1328.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Serious
 "T-this is about me and Daria-san...? What exactly does that mean!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Normal
 "After chatting happily at the hamburger place, when you let your guard down, we'll call Daria-onee-sama, and trap you into having no choice but to participate in the Princess Election." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Smile
 "Hehe... It's quite a sneaky plan, right? The point is, Hermes, who’s involved, means no harm." ]])

    MSG([[ Almeria smiled mischievously. But contrary to her expression, the plan she described was full of malice, and it sent chills down my spine. ]])

    MSG([[ Could it be that this date was a trap from the very beginning? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2250.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Flustered
 "Why do you want to go so far to have the Princess Election with me? I don't see the benefit in it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02na")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0143.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Evil Smile
 "Because Mother Nemesia has realized that Erika Ikusa is really Mina-chan." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0514.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Flustered
 "Eh...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0144.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Evil Smile
 "For the conservative faction, the popular 'Princess' being actually a boy is perfect for promoting Yuriai Academy’s transition to co-education." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0145.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Evil Smile
 "So that’s why Daria-onee-sama and I have been instructed to corner you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Flustered
 "Th-then why are you telling me this, Almeria-san...? Isn't it dangerous to go against orders?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Wry Smile
 "" ]])
    -- //ボイス無し

    MSG([[ Unable to respond, Almeria silently laughed with a troubled look. ]])

    MSG([[ Her face looked somehow melancholic, as if she was resigned to the events ahead. ]])

    MSG([[ I unintentionally let slip my true feelings— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2251.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Serious
 "I c-can't forgive this..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0146.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Normal
 "Well, that reaction is normal." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0146_02.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Smile
 "I'll handle the rest. I'll also cleverly deceive Daria-onee-sama, so Mina-chan, just go home without worrying about it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03bb")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1329.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Serious
 "No, I won't obey. I can't just leave this alone!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1330.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Serious
 "To use Almeria-san and Daria-san in such a plan... I absolutely won’t allow it! Almeria-san, let’s fight Nemesia-san together!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0147.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Flustered
 "Y-you mean you can't forgive how we’re being treated!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Almeria’s eyes widened. ]])

    MSG([[ Why was she surprised? The treatment Almeria and the others receive from our mother was far too cruel. ]])

    MSG([[ To think of using one’s own daughters for such a despicable ambition—there’s no way I could stand by and ignore such a horrible situation. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0148.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Flustered
 "D-don't worry about me, just think about yourself and Marika." ]])

    MSG([[ Almeria spoke in a choked voice, her expression on the verge of tears, trying to reason with me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0148_02.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Sadness
 "If we don’t hurry, we’ll raise suspicion! I’ll go to the hamburger place alone, so Mina-chan, go home!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1331.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Serious
 "There’s no need for you to go alone. Almeria-san, please come with me!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Surprised
 "Huh?" ]])

    MSG([[ I grasped Almeria’s hand as she tried to dash toward the station to stop her. ]])

    MSG([[ I’ve already made up my mind. No matter what fate awaits, I won’t leave Almeria’s side. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if it means opposing Nemesia Himegami, I will not let go of this hand. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Casual Wear / Smile
 "I will protect you, Almeria-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU02ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】Blush
 "Mina, chan." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Almeria’s hand squeezed mine tightly. Together, we turned our backs to the station and stepped forward. ]])

    MSG([[ Thus, we decided to rebel against the Himegami family. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_10")
end
